asset.author: Victorinox AG
asset.hookText: Victorinox is proud to present to you its latest video guide "how to choose a knife". This movie was produced in collaboration with  Felix Halter; a renowned Swiss Chef. The movie covers the different types of knives Victorinox is offering and splendidly demonstrates their purpose of use in detail.
